text: Best Thing Ever may refer to: * "Best Thing Ever", a 1987 song by Scritti Politti, featured in Who's That Girl (soundtrack) and then Provision (album) * "Best Thing Ever", a 2013 song by Fortunate, featured in The X Factor (Australia) * "Best Thing Ever", a 2015 song by Niykee Heaton * The Best Thing Ever, an American punk rock band
title: Best Thing Ever
